Title: Relates to the creation of an electric vehicle clean energy website
Summary: Directs the commissioner of motor vehicles, in cooperation with NYSERDA, to create an electric vehicle clean energy website containing a carbon footprint calculator, a cost-and-mileage calculator, an electric vehicle fueling station locator, and other electric vehicle ownership information.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the creation of an electric vehicle clean energy website
